name: Panda's Wit
description:
Main description:

In this top-down shooter you play as a panda, fighting against tough bosses with an array of make-shift bamboo tools which consume bamboo resource. Are you up for the challenge?

Controls (There is a menu for them as well):

  • WASD - Move
  • R or Right Mouse Button - Removes all placed tiles on the floor if they in close proximity to you (and you have the building tool out)
  • 1, 2, 3 - Switch between tools
  • Esc - Paused menu
  • F11 - Switch to windowed/ full-screen mode

Extra information (SOME INCLUDE SPOILERS):

  • Building tiles have unique properties against bosses.
  • You cannot remove building tiles unless you are in range of them.
  • Bosses take more damage when in a "vulnerable" state.
  • When in "Frenzy mode", you are granted unlimited ammo and 2x fire rate for a short period of time.
  • All code / assets / SFX were written / created  by me.
  • Game was built using Pygame.
  • Building in front of bosses slows them down.
